channel.title: makefile on karanbir
channel.description: Recent content in makefile on karanbir

item.title: Makefile automation as part of my development workflow
item.description: I have been using Makefile from spinning up docker containers to setting up local dev environment venv (yeah I know I should be using docker-compose) and I can safely say its still one of the best tools out for automating tasks. Recently I included Makefile into this repo so that I can build/publish/run hugo site easily without having to look through documentation on which command to run for local-server or build assets.
